desc: 全ての状態異常にかかりにくくなる

dictionary.lore: An amulet named after the land it was found in as its creator remains a mystery. As it doesn't completely protect its user from all ailments, it is believed that it was a by-product produced when forging a better sphere. "Love alone protects nothing, and power alone never brings peace" was engraved on the back of the amulet, sparking speculation over its creator.

name: 煉光ミグ・デリン
